name: Evil Despicable Villain Revenge
description:
The evil mad scientist's lab is being invaded and you must help him protect it!

Evil Despicable Villain Revenge is a simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages. There are unseen forces out to get the evil genius - and he's not going down without a fight!

Do you think you have what it takes to protect the evil lab from monsters and government agents? Can you collect enough money along the way? The game will start moving faster and faster, so watch out for those enemies!

Collect enough cash and you can unlock more evil scientists for even more fun!

*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect cash to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for both kids and adults
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch

Download Evil Despicable Villain Revenge right now!
